mapper.select: SELECT c.name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM user_challenge_record ucr JOIN cyrangechallenges cc ON ucr.challenge_id = cc.question_id JOIN categories c ON cc.category = c.id WHERE ucr.user_id = #{userId} AND ucr.is_correct = 1 GROUP BY c.name

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ucr.finish_time, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(c.points) AS score FROM user_challenge_record ucr JOIN cyrangechallenges c ON ucr.challenge_id = c.question_id WHERE ucr.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ucr.finish_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month;
